item.title: Breaking RSA - TryHackMe Writeup
item.description: TryHackMe - Breaking RSA This room present’s an exercise in which a public RSA SSH key is given to you, the goal to complete this room is to successfully recover the private key and then use the recovered private key to authenticate via SSH. I began with nmap scanning, and after a bit of web directory enumeration, we find a RSA public key SSH entry. We then download this public key, extract n the public modulus, and e the public exponent, and attempt to factor n into it’s prime factors p and q.
